tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Shruti Was Very helpful and Spontaneous with her Diagnosis and Treatment thereafter .  Procedure carried was very smooth .

Shruti explained the problem extremely clearly and did what was required only. I was in a lot of pain when I went and she promptly gave me appointment and ensured I went back home  relieved.  Also just to mention during this Covid period especially the entire clinic looked very clean n hygienic and all necessary precautions were taken by her to ensure patients wellbeing. Thanks a lot Shruti!
Doctor is very friendly in nature. She explain my problem very much calmly. Thank u for all your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Good thing about her is she reduces your fear for the problem.  And is gentle and polite .   Also explains the problem clearly.
It was a good experience visiting the doctor she treated nicely without giving any pain and for future treatment I would like to visit the same doctor again
